instruction: Compose lyrics for a folk song.
output:
Verse 1:
In this land we stay alive
Not a moment of the dark can make us hide
For those that come and dare to try
Will find that strength is all they need to thrive

Chorus:
Rise up and stand, let your voice be heard
Let the world know that your courage is cured
Be brave, be bold, it's time to be sure
To bring a peace this world has never known before

Verse 2:
We have come from many places
Of every kind and every race
Though our stories differ so untold
We stand together and break through the cold

Chorus:
Rise up and stand, let your voice be heard
Let the world know that your courage is cured
Be brave, be bold, it's time to be sure
To bring a peace this world has never known before

Verse 3:
Let's come together, from here and beyond
We have the power to make a new bond
To make a change and spread the light
Let us be fearless and stand up with might

Chorus:
Rise up and stand, let your voice be heard
Let the world know that your courage is cured
Be brave, be bold, it's time to be sure
To bring a peace this world has never known before
